ocrSettings.title: Conversion Settings
ocrSettings.subtitle: Configure OCR detection and PPTX export parameters
ocrSettings.modelSizeFallback: Switched to mobile model due to GPU memory limit

maxSideLen.label: Target Max Side Length
maxSideLen.description: Target max side length for preprocessing (Recommended: 2048). Larger images are downscaled, smaller images keep original size.
maxSideLen.effect: Higher: preserves more details, fixes missing spaces | Lower: faster processing but may blur

threshold.label: Detection Threshold
threshold.description: DBNet binarization threshold. Converts model output to binary mask.
threshold.effect: Higher: less noise but may miss text | Lower: more sensitive but noisier

boxThreshold.label: Box Threshold
boxThreshold.description: Minimum confidence score for text boxes. Boxes below this are filtered out.
boxThreshold.effect: Higher: only high confidence boxes | Lower: more boxes but may include noise

unclipRatio.label: Unclip Ratio
unclipRatio.description: DBNet box expansion factor. Model shrinks text boxes during training, needs expansion to original size.
unclipRatio.effect: Higher: larger boxes with more surrounding area | Lower: tighter boxes closer to text

dilationH.label: Horizontal Dilation
dilationH.description: Morphological horizontal dilation iterations. Connects characters in the same line.
dilationH.effect: Higher: easier to connect same-line text | Lower: keeps characters separate

dilationV.label: Vertical Dilation
dilationV.description: Morphological vertical dilation iterations. Connects strokes but may merge different lines if too high.
dilationV.effect: Higher: connects strokes but may merge lines | Lower: avoids cross-line merging

verticalCutThreshold.label: Vertical Cut Threshold
verticalCutThreshold.description: XY-Cut algorithm threshold for column detection (multiplier of line height).
verticalCutThreshold.effect: Higher: fewer vertical cuts, columns may merge | Lower: more aggressive column splitting

horizontalCutThreshold.label: Horizontal Cut Threshold
horizontalCutThreshold.description: XY-Cut algorithm threshold for paragraph detection (multiplier of line height).
horizontalCutThreshold.effect: Higher: fewer horizontal cuts, paragraphs may merge | Lower: more aggressive paragraph splitting

sameLineThreshold.label: Same Line Threshold
sameLineThreshold.description: Threshold to determine if two regions are on the same line (multiplier of min height).
sameLineThreshold.effect: Higher: more lenient same-line detection | Lower: stricter, may split into multiple lines

fontSizeDiffThreshold.label: Font Size Diff Threshold
fontSizeDiffThreshold.description: Regions with height ratio exceeding this won't be merged (prevents title/body merging).
fontSizeDiffThreshold.effect: Higher: allows larger size differences to merge | Lower: different sizes stay separate

colorDiffThreshold.label: Color Diff Threshold
colorDiffThreshold.description: RGB Euclidean distance threshold. Colors beyond this are considered distinct (preserves highlights).
colorDiffThreshold.effect: Higher: more colors treated as same | Lower: preserves more color differences

lineHeightRatio.label: Line Height Ratio
lineHeightRatio.description: Ratio for converting detected line height to font size.
lineHeightRatio.effect: Higher: smaller fonts (assumes wider line spacing) | Lower: larger fonts

minFontSize.label: Min Font Size
minFontSize.description: Minimum font size (points) for PPTX text boxes.
minFontSize.effect: Higher: prevents very small text | Lower: allows smaller fonts

maxFontSize.label: Max Font Size
maxFontSize.description: Maximum font size (points) for PPTX text boxes.
maxFontSize.effect: Higher: allows larger titles | Lower: caps font size

tour.keyboardHint: Press ← → to navigate, ESC to skip

apiKey.title: Set Up API Key
apiKey.description: First, enter your Google Gemini API Key. This is required to use the tool. Your API Key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to any server.

modeSelector.title: Choose Generation Mode
modeSelector.description: We offer 6 different modes: Generate, Sticker, Edit, Story, Diagram, and Video. Choose the mode that best fits your needs.

promptInput.title: Enter Your Prompt
promptInput.description: Describe the image you want to generate here. The more detailed your description, the better the results! You can use any language. More advanced options are available below.

generateButton.title: Start Generating
generateButton.description: Ready? Click this button to start generating your image! You can see the AI's thinking process during generation.

history.title: Generation History
history.description: All generated images are saved here. Click a record to reload its settings, click the thumbnail to preview images. The transfer icon (⇄) in the top right lets you export or import your history.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Want to learn more? Click the book icon in the footer to access the complete documentation, including detailed guides for each mode, prompt tips, and advanced settings.
